ctu_text:
<br>

The main objective of the &quot;Distribution of Tractor Unit&quot; scheme is to revive the agricultural sector and help in doubling the farmer’s income by 2022. Under the new revised tractor scheme, the government will provide one tractor along with some necessary accessories in each revenue village at subsidized rates. The state govt. will distribute approx 10,109 tractors in the first phase.
caption: Poster 1/5 – Target_Pop (numbers verified)
